hero.title: Smart Personal Finance Management Platform
hero.subtitle: Easily manage your income, expenses, budget planning and financial goals. Support multi-user collaboration to make family and team financial management simple and efficient.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: We provide comprehensive financial management tools to help you easily control your personal and family financial situation

accounts.title: Multi-Account Management
accounts.description: Support various account types including bank accounts, cash, investments, assets and debts, unified management of all your financial accounts

transactions.title: Smart Bookkeeping
transactions.description: Quickly record income, expenses and transfers, automatic categorization, support batch import and custom tag classification

budgets.title: Budget Planning
budgets.description: Set monthly, quarterly or annual budgets, track spending progress in real-time, smart alerts for budget overruns

analytics.title: Financial Analytics
analytics.description: Rich charts and reports, deep analysis of income and expense structure, spending trends and financial health

collaboration.title: Multi-user Collaboration
collaboration.description: Support family members or teams to jointly manage finances, permission control, real-time synchronization updates

security.title: Security Guarantee
security.description: Bank-level data encryption, multi-factor authentication, ensuring your financial information is absolutely secure
